abstract: Greenville, SC, police report gang member opened fire on officers as they attempted to serve arrest warrant, killing one before turning gun on himself.
lead_paragraph: A gang member committed suicide moments after firing on officers who were trying to serve him with an arrest warrant, the police said

headline.main: South Carolina: Suspect Killed Himself After Killing Officer, Police Say
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Suspect Killed Himself After Killing an Officer, Police Say

snippet: A gang member committed suicide moments after firing on officers who were trying to serve him with an arrest warrant, the police said
